about_the_game:
In Time Handlers, dive into an exhilarating cooperative adventure with a friend. Become employees of the mysterious Time Company tasked with repairing the spatio-temporal rifts that threaten the balance of time and space that manifest across different eras. Face bewildering and exciting challenges.




In this 3D puzzle game, you explore a mysterious tower filled with challenging obstacles. Each floor presents new complex puzzles that require close communication and flawless cooperation between the two players. Be creative, solve twisted riddles, and use your wits to progress.




The narrator will follow your progress in the tower, so be prepared for sharp comments and witty remarks that spice up your interactions with the game.




Your ultimate goal is to climb the tower's floors, solve all the complex puzzles, and reach the heart of the spatio-temporal rift. Only skillful puzzle-solving will allow you to restore order in the universe and mend the tears of time.




Will you succeed in solving puzzles to repair the rift that threatens time?
What are these rifts really?
What is the narrator's purpose and who is he?

Answer these questions through the different trials you will encounter!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Big Sur (11) or above
  • Processor: Intel core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Big Sur (11) or above
  • Processor: Intel core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Time Handlers Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel core i5 8600 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel core i5 8600 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Time Handlers is a cooperative puzzle game where you play as 2 employees of the Time Company tasked to repair the spatio-temporal rifts caused by a mysterious tower. Face baffling and exciting challenges to progress through the various levels of the rift that threatens time.
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
